title: Large 1 Bed 1 Bath with Fireplace 8-31-2022
map_address: 263 Weatherstone Lane NE near Fairgrounds Rd
posting_body: Enjoy a cup of coffee on your private balcony with extra storage, gazing out onto a lush greenwood background.
Enjoy the comfort and convenience of doing laundry in your own home!
With large doorways and floor plans, our apartments are comfortable with a dining area, ceiling fan, and a peek-a-boo window opening up the kitchen and dining area.
The bathroom and kitchen layout are larger than our typical 1 bed 1 bath homes with your fridge, range, garbage disposal, and dishwasher.
Included with every home is Reserved Parking.
We are happy to schedule personal tours upon request, once available.
We are Pet Friendly and welcome Dogs and Cats in all shapes and sizes!
Ask to be Email Information, Pictures, and Online Applications!
Apply, Lease, and Pay all online, 6-12 Month Lease.
Close to Shopping, PSNS, Schools, and More.
On a Bus Route with Park & Ride Close By.
Minutes from Schools, Shopping, Entertainment & Employment...Washer & Dryer in Every Home...
Pet Friendly, No Pet Rent or Breed/Weight Restrictions!
*Our Business Office is open Monday-Friday between 9:00 AM & 5:00 PM.
